mapper.select: SELECT id,user_name,password,disabled FROM t_user t WHERE t.user_name=#{param1}
SELECT id,user_name,password,uuid,disabled FROM t_user WHERE user_name=#{username} AND disabled = FALSE
SELECT count(1) FROM t_user u JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.code != 'admin'

SELECT u.id,u.user_name,u.uuid,r.code,r.name,r.id AS role_id,u.disabled FROM t_user u JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.code != 'admin' ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
